column4: I also managed to uninstall transmissions indicator applet, how can I reinstall all the default indicator applets for natty?
Try installing indicator-applet-complete.  Or possibly indicator-datetime.  Get a list of the indicator packages by doing "apt-cache show indicator-"<tab><tab>.
I'm trying to install ubuntu-desktop again, if that doesnt work i'll try your way
That ought to do it too - although it'll pull evolution back in IIRC.
